definition: shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Mass production has brought many old trades to an end.
sentences.chinese: 許多老字號商行都敗給了大規模生產。

sentences.english: The hundred years old company welcomed visitants on that day.
sentences.chinese: 百年老字號，在這天迎來了貴賓。

sentences.english: But now seem, there is still a lot of name could not find a way home.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在看來，還是有很多老字號找不到回家的路了。

sentences.english: Wan Sheng Rice Firm is an old and famous rice shop, founded in early 1911.
sentences.chinese: 萬盛米行是一間老字號米鋪，始建於民國初年。

sentences.english: The company was founded in 1998, is old inspection company.
sentences.chinese: 本公司成立於1998年，是老字號的報檢公司。

sentences.english: Affected by the market-oriented economy, Laozihao are taking the shine off.
sentences.chinese: 受到市場經濟的影響，老字號的招牌正在褪減。

sentences.english: Diyang foodstuff is a honored enterprise with twenty-years history and a famous brand.
sentences.chinese: 帝洋食品是二十多年老字號，老品牌。

sentences.english: In conclusion, Laozihao is the carrier of the traditional culture and arts.
sentences.chinese: 總結，老字號是傳統文化和藝術的載體。

sentences.english: "Cheap Corner" brand restaurant, which has hundreds-year history, provides roasted duck in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 酒店特有百年老字號“便宜坊”烤鴨店。

sentences.english: In addition, some of the old Nancheng food shops are also very easy to find.
sentences.chinese: 另外，一些南城的老字號也在這條街上非常容易見到。

sentences.english: Shengxifu, an enterprise that markets a time-honored Chinese brand, dates back 95 years.
sentences.chinese: 盛錫福是京華老字號企業，至今已有95年的歷史。

sentences.english: Had Lunch at an old pub outside Manchester.
sentences.chinese: 中午在曼徹斯特郊外的一家老字號小店吃了飯。

sentences.english: He said that foreign brands to enter the name will be self-improvement.
sentences.chinese: 他說，洋品牌進入也會促使老字號自我改進。

definition: to enter and garrison/(fig.) to establish a presence in
